EOF

Bash(# Click ""Use Current Location"" button
osascript <<'EOF'
tell application "Simulator" to activate
delay 0.3
tell application "System Events"
    tell process "Simulator"
        set frontmost to true
        delay 0.2
        set winPos to position of window 1
        set winSize to size of window 1
        set clickX to \(item 1 of winPos\) + \(\(item 1 of winSize\) / 2\)
        -- This button is higher up - around middle of screen
        set clickY to \(item 2 of winPos\) + \(\(item 2 of winSize\) / 2\) + 30
        click at {clickX, clickY}
    end tell
end tell
EOF

sleep 1.5

# Now click Continue \(green button that appears after location is set\)
osascript <<'EOF'
tell application "Simulator" to activate
delay 0.3
tell application "System Events"
    tell process "Simulator"
        set frontmost to true
        delay 0.2
        set winPos to position of window 1
        set winSize to size of window 1
        set clickX to \(item 1 of winPos\) + \(\(item 1 of winSize\) / 2\)
        set clickY to \(item 2 of winPos\) + \(item 2 of winSize\) - 150
        click at {clickX, clickY}
    end tell
end tell
EOF

sleep 1
xcrun simctl io booted screenshot ~/Desktop/ExitCheck-Screenshots/06-choose-template.png
echo ""Screenshot 6 captured - Choose Template"")
